summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Strategy Mini-App P0-P1 features: MetaMask wallet connection, CoinGecko Terminal integration, navigation, and logo display. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: MetaMask Connect Wallet button visible and clickable
Connect Wallet button shows proper error when MetaMask not installed (Russian: 'MetaMask не установлен')
CoinGecko Market Terminal displays real crypto prices (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana)
CoinGecko refresh button works - updates timestamp and data
Navigation between Home, Stats, NFTs, Leaderboard views all functional
Logo displays correctly without container box (no border, transparent background)
Home view: 4 stat cards, progress bar (100%), How It Works (4 steps), CTA button
Stats view: CoinGecko Terminal, 3 key metrics, Price History chart, Orderbook
NFTs view: CTA banner, 6 NFT cards grid with prices and Below Floor badges
Leaderboard view: Top Members list with 5 positions, avatars, XP, trophy badges
Mobile responsiveness: Navigation labels hide on mobile, layout adapts properly
All data-testid attributes present for testing
test_credentials: No credentials needed - CoinGecko API is public
seed_data_creation: None - uses static JSON file strategy_state.json
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0-P1 features tested and working: MetaMask wallet connection (shows error when not installed), CoinGecko Terminal with real BTC/ETH/SOL prices, navigation between 4 views, logo without container box. Strategy data is MOCKED from strategy_state.json file.

mocked_apis_list: Strategy statistics data from strategy_state.json (treasury, NFT supply, activity, market data)
